CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Delivered to Retail stage positioned above or below the Post-Processing stage?
SRP.A: The Delivered to Retail stage is positioned {below} the Post-Processing stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
VE.A: The value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection is {9504}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Harvest?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Harvest is {17477}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Harvest, with a value of {17477}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Delivered to Retail, with a value of {5788}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {2888} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 10639? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Harvest} stage has {17477}, the {Post-Processing} stage has {11774}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 10639? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {9504}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {6616}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {5788}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 6202 and 14625? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Processing} stage has {11774}, the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {9504}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {6616}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Harvest to Post-Processing, from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, or from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Harvest} to stage {Post-Processing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Harvest} and {Post-Processing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
